meanings.meaning: 1. departure; departing from ...; leaving at (e.g. 8:30) See also 着６時発のニューヨーク行きの列車に乗りたいのです。I want to catch the six o'clock train to New York.
2. sent from ...; (a letter, etc.) dated ...; datelined ...
3. counter for engines (on an aircraft)

4. counter for gunshots, bursts of gas, etc.; counter for bullets, bombs, etc.; counter for blows (punches); counter for jokes, puns, etc.; counter for ideas, thoughts or guesses 彼は３発撃った。He fired three shots.
5. counter for ejaculations or sexual intercourse Vulgar expression or word
1. green dragon tile Mahjong, Abbreviation, See also 緑發
2. winning hand with a pung (or kong) of green dragon tiles Mahjong
發 【ハツ】、𤼵 【ハツ】

sentences.translation: I want to catch the six o'clock train to New York.
He fired three shots.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to stand (up); to rise; to get to one's feet; to stand on end (e.g. of hairs); to stick up 次々に立って出ていった。One after another they stood up and went out.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to stand (in a position; of a person, tree, building, etc.); to be situated (in, on) 断崖のてっぺんに古い城が立っている。An old castle stands on top of the cliff.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to be (in difficulties, the lead, etc.); to put oneself (in a position or situation); to take up (a position, post, etc.); to position oneself その大臣は不正取引によって窮地に立ちました。The minister was in a fix over illegal dealings.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to leave (to do something) 失礼しますといって席を立った。I excused myself from the table.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to depart (on a journey, trip, etc.); to leave; to set off; to start oft. written as 発つあの人はアメリカへ立ったまま消息がない。Nothing has been heard from him since he left for America.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to get stuck (into; of an arrow, thorn etc.); to pierce

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to develop (of a haze, waves, etc.); to form (of steam, bubbles, etc.); to appear (of a rainbow, clouds, etc.); to rise (of smoke, waves, etc.); to begin to blow (of a wind, breeze, etc.) 煙突から煙が立っていた。Smoke was rising from the chimney.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to spread (of a rumour, reputation, etc.); to be become widely known その過激派が政府打倒の陰謀を企てているという噂が立ってる。There is a rumor that the radicals are plotting against the government.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to stand (for election); to run 彼は今度の選挙には立たないだろう。He is not running in the coming election.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to take action; to act; to rise (up); to rouse oneself also written as 起つ彼らは圧制に反抗して立った。They rose against oppression.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to be established (of a policy, plan, objective, etc.); to be formed 彼らのチームは今シーズンほとんど勝算が立たない。Their team doesn't have a ghost of a chance of winning this season.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to be valid (of an argument, logic, etc.); to hold up; to hold water; to stand up (e.g. of evidence); to be logical; to be reasonable

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to be sustained (of a living, business, etc.); to be maintained; to survive; to be preserved (of one's reputation, honour, etc.); to be saved

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to start (of a season); to begin

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to be held (of a market) 市は月曜ごとに立つ。The market is held every Monday.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 16. to shut (of a door, shoji, etc.); to be shut; to be closed

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'tsu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 17. to be (the result of a division)

sentences.translation: One after another they stood up and went out.
An old castle stands on top of the cliff.
The minister was in a fix over illegal dealings.
I excused myself from the table.
Nothing has been heard from him since he left for America.
Smoke was rising from the chimney.
There is a rumor that the radicals are plotting against the government.
He is not running in the coming election.
They rose against oppression.
Their team doesn't have a ghost of a chance of winning this season.
The market is held every Monday.

1. development; growth; expansion; extension; flourishing 彼らは町の発展に大いに貢献してくれるだろう。They will contribute greatly to the growth of the town.
2. development (of a situation, story, etc.); advancement; progression; unfolding 私達の関係が発展することを希望しています。I hope to see our relationship expand.
